cn.releaseNotes:
增加日历查找记录
修复问题
cn.description:
随时随地，将你想记录的文字，图片，视频，语音以及位置都得以妥善保存
更有备忘提醒让繁忙的你无一错漏！

hk.description:
Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度的恐怖或驚嚇題材
hk.releaseNotes: Changed default lane control setting to touch controls.
hk.description:
Thumper是一款節奏暴力遊戲：經典動作、猛烈的速度和野蠻的肉體衝撞。你是一隻太空甲蟲，勇敢闖入虛無空間，對抗巨大的首腦。

藉由特別的便攜版，讓你一手掌握九個史詩級別。

向前邁進，掌握新動作，並在可怕的魔王戰中倖存下來。被衝擊原聲推動，你會感受到每一個破碎的影響。要達到共鳴，你必須征服節奏地獄。

■特點■
·氣密一觸式控制
·肖像和風景皆為流暢的60 FPS
·九個史詩級別
·刺激的魔王戰
·迷幻視覺效果和原創配樂
·PLAY+模式（增加挑戰難度和速度）
·在iPhone X上以全螢幕顯示
·iCloud 同步

■請注意■
無線耳機會造成顯著的音頻延遲。為了獲得最佳體驗，強烈建議使用有線耳機或音響。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
hk.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
hk.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

Incredibox 能讓你在一群快樂的節奏口技達人幫助下創作自己的音樂。選擇你的音樂風格，開始錄製、錄音並分享你的混音曲。透過嘻哈節拍、電子波、流行人聲、爵士搖擺、巴西節奏等等聲音，讓你沉醉在音樂的律動之中。此外，還可以探索社群創建的各種模組，其內容素材豐富，能讓你混音上數小時，而且無廣告或應用程式內購。

Incredibox 是遊戲，也是工具，更重要的是一種視聽體驗，所帶來的樂趣很快就成為各年齡層的熱門選擇。音樂、圖形、動畫與互動性的完美結合，讓 Incredibox 適合每個人。由於 Incredibox 讓學習變得有趣且具娛樂性，現在廣為全球各地學校使用。

怎麼玩？很簡單！將圖示拖放到虛擬人物上讓他們唱歌，然後開始創作你的音樂。找對的聲音組合，解鎖動畫合唱，增強你的旋律。

只要你的作品聽起來很棒，就儲存並分享，以盡可能獲得投票。假如你獲得足夠的票數，就能進入 Incredibox 歷史，加入 50 強排行榜！準備好展示你的作品了嗎？

你還可以從應用程式中將你的混音曲下載成 MP3 反覆聆聽！

懶得創作自己的混音曲？沒問題，讓自動模式為你播放吧！

調高音量，輕鬆一下 ;)

****************
Incredibox，來自法國里昂，於 2009 年創立的 So Far So Good 工作室的心血結晶。最初以網頁形式出現，隨後推出了移動及平板應用程式，迅速成為熱門產品。它贏得了多項獎項，並出現在各大國際媒體上，包括：BBC、Adobe、FWA、Gizmodo、Slate、Konbini、Softonic、Kotaku、Cosmopolitan、PocketGamer、AppAdvice、AppSpy、Vice、Ultralinx 等等。線上演示影片自創建以來已吸引超過 1 億訪問者。

MiniGames 是一個包含新、復古和現代遊戲的合集。您可以在您的 Apple Watch、iPhone 或 iPad 上無廣告遊玩！
這就像是您隨身攜帶的個人遊戲機台。

這個合集包含 24 款遊戲：

■ PONG
遊玩其中一個最早創建的電子遊戲。這個簡單的網球類遊戲是一個絕對的經典。

■ BRICK BREAK
一個有趣的復古落磚遊戲。使用數位旋鈕或您的手指來移動磚塊。點擊以旋轉，向下滑動以放置磚塊。將磚塊堆疊在一起以清除一行並獲取一些分數。

■ INVADERS
經典街機動作。射擊所有太空入侵者，在他們抓到你之前。擊中母艦以獲取獎勵分數。

■ 2048
在您的手錶或手機上享受令人上癮的 2048 遊戲。滑動數字瓷磚來合併它們。將瓷磚合併以達到 2048。

■ TUBE TWIST
引導您的跑者穿過無盡的管道。扭轉管道以避開洞穴和尖刺。收集黃色能量球，收集的越多，速度提升的時間越長。點擊您的玩家來啟動加速。加速時撞擊紅色跳躍點可獲取額外分數。

■ BUBBLE
經典的三消益智遊戲。按顏色連接泡泡以清除它們。

■ MISSILE
您能在致命的追蹤導彈攻擊下生存多久？操縱您的戰鬥機以避開導彈並讓它們互相碰撞。

■ HOP
從平台跳到平台以獲得更多的高度和分數。在途中射擊帶翅膀的壞蛋。

■ DRIFT
享受在險惡道路上的高辛烷值漂移。一個錯誤的動作就會墜落。儘可能長時間生存以獲得最高分數。收集星星以獲取額外分數。

■ CONG
這像 Pong，但在一個圓圈裡。使用數位旋鈕來移動圓圈內的拍子，保持球在遊戲中。

■ TOWER
通過堆疊彩色方塊來建造您的塔。完美放置它們以獲取額外分數。

■ FLAP
引導鳥兒穿越無盡的森林，不斷拍動翅膀。

■ FROG ROAD
幫助可愛的青蛙避開汽車並穿過馬路。這是經典 Frogger 遊戲的 3D 升級版。

■ BLOCK RUN
想跑步嗎？幫助體素小人避開五彩繽紛的障礙物，通過跳躍、滾動和轉彎來完成挑戰。

■ MATCHTRIS
Tetris 和 Dr. Mario 的混搭遊戲。移動下落的方塊來連接 4 個或更多相同顏色的方塊以清除它們。設置方塊以實現連鎖反應並獲取額外分數。

■ DRONE
駕駛您的無人機穿過外星飛船的無盡走廊。

■ THRUST
穿上火箭靴並飛越黑暗的洞穴。Thrust 結合了經典洞穴飛行遊戲和 Flappy Bird 的元素。

■ SUPER JUMP
我們將平台遊戲的樂趣與無盡奔跑者遊戲相結合。通過跳過洞穴、壕溝和敵人來保持您的玩家奔跑。收集水果以獲取分數，您得分越多，跑得越快。

■ RETRO RACER
受 Outrun 和 Pole Position 等偽 3D 賽車遊戲啟發，但具有現代圖形。享受超現實、令人興奮的速度感，並競速以擊敗時鐘。

請注意，此遊戲需要第 4 代或更新版本的 Apple Watch。

■ CONTRA PANG
將 Contra 的射擊動作與 Pang 的泡泡消除樂趣相結合的遊戲。

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
經典 Space Invaders 的新變種。具有獨特的圓形設計和大量的能量提升。

■ MOON SNAKE
我們將經典的吃水果蛇遊戲帶到了月球。避開炸彈和自己的尾巴以生存。

■ DUAL BREAK
還有什麼比經典的 Breakout 拍子遊戲更好？怎麼樣再加上能量提升和額外的拍子來控制。

■ CIRCLE BREAK
這就像圓形 Pong 遇上 Breakout。保持球不離開圓圈並打破所有障礙以完成關卡。

功能：
• 無廣告！
• 支援 Apple Watch
• 屏幕震動
• 震動效果
• 音效
• 音樂
• 排行榜

advisories: 偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.releaseNotes:
- Added gamepad support
- Minor bug fixes
- Technical updates (Apple Metal rendering, Core Audio)
hk.description:
《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是由《銀河歷險記》(Samorost)和《植物精靈》(Botanicula)的製作者開發的屢獲殊榮的獨立冒險遊戲。

《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是一個完整長度的冒險遊戲。玩家將扮演一個流亡到垃圾堆的小機器人，從廢料場返回城市，並打敗壞人黑帽兄弟，拯救他的機器人女友。玩家需要使用邏輯、收集重要資訊及物品，來解決各式難題，才可以拯救機器人女友。快一起和可愛的小機器人，解開重重的謎團吧！

絕對好玩 - TouchArcade
4/4 - USA TODAY
4/4 - SlideToPlay
9/10 - Pocket Gamer

獎項：
- IGF，卓越視覺藝術獎
- Gamasutra，年度最佳獨立遊戲獎
- VGChartz.com，年度最佳獨立遊戲獎

mo.description:
Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度的恐怖或驚嚇題材

- Minor bug fixes
- Technical updates (Apple Metal rendering, Core Audio)
mo.description:
《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是由《銀河歷險記》(Samorost)和《植物精靈》(Botanicula)的製作者開發的屢獲殊榮的獨立冒險遊戲。

《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是一個完整長度的冒險遊戲。玩家將扮演一個流亡到垃圾堆的小機器人，從廢料場返回城市，並打敗壞人黑帽兄弟，拯救他的機器人女友。玩家需要使用邏輯、收集重要資訊及物品，來解決各式難題，才可以拯救機器人女友。快一起和可愛的小機器人，解開重重的謎團吧！

絕對好玩 - TouchArcade
4/4 - USA TODAY
4/4 - SlideToPlay
9/10 - Pocket Gamer

獎項：
- IGF，卓越視覺藝術獎
- Gamasutra，年度最佳獨立遊戲獎
- VGChartz.com，年度最佳獨立遊戲獎

And there are reminders that you can never forget.

tw.releaseNotes: - 新功能：現在可在「行事曆」檢視於所選日期建立條目。
tw.description:
Apple 年度最佳應用程式 Day One，全球下載次數超過 1,500 萬次，獲得 200,000 次 5 星評價，徹底改變了寫日記的方式，讓你記錄生活中的點點滴滴。  在全球最值得信賴的數位日記中安全地儲存音訊、影片、照片、筆記等其他內容。

「Day One 創造珍貴的回憶，近乎完美：完全隱密的數位空間。」 –《紐約時報》

「Day One 讓寫日記變得輕鬆愉快。」 – 《連線》

「這款優異的日記應用程式賞心悅目、簡單好用，讓競爭對手難以超越。」–《Macworld》

為什麼選擇 Day One？

Day One 是原創日記應用程式。十年來持續更新並增添功能，打造全球最隱密、最值得信賴，也最好用的日記平台。

簡單好用，讓人著迷

• 獲獎設計，美觀大方
• 無限文本條目
• 無限量照片和影片*
•強大的 RTF 文字格式與 Markdown
• 記錄生活點滴的全新方式*

私密又安全

• 自動備份，妥善保護日記條目
• 端對端加密，100% 確保日記隱密
•透過密碼或 TouchID 保障日記條目安全
•提供多種匯出選項 (pdf、純文字、JSON 等)，確保日記條目永遠歸你所有

養成並保持習慣

•可設定的提醒通知
• 每日不重覆的日記提示，消除你的撰寫障礙
•可自訂範本讓你省下時間，並讓版面看起來井井有條
• 今日檢視讓你快速查看今天去過哪些地方、做了哪些事

隨時隨地寫日記

• 跨平台應用程式，可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用
• 可透過電子郵件直接傳送條目到日記中

專為記錄回憶打造

• 「在這一天」功能讓你重溫過往回憶
• 標籤、我的最愛和搜尋篩選條件讓你輕鬆找到所需內容
• 「地圖檢視」讓你快速查看已記錄的所有地點

*Day One 是款提供使用者永久免費使用的應用程式，完全不限條目數量。 Day One Premium 會員另可享有無限量照片、影片及同步功能。 立即開始免費試用。

隱私權政策：https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/

使用條款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

如需技術協助或有其他問題，請前往：https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
偶而/輕微的驚悚/恐怖題材
tw.releaseNotes: Changed default lane control setting to touch controls.
tw.description:
Thumper是一款節奏暴力遊戲：經典動作、猛烈的速度和野蠻的肉體衝撞。你是一隻太空甲蟲，勇敢闖入虛無空間，對抗巨大的首腦。

藉由特別的便攜版，讓你一手掌握九個史詩級別。

向前邁進，掌握新動作，並在可怕的魔王戰中倖存下來。被衝擊原聲推動，你會感受到每一個破碎的影響。要達到共鳴，你必須征服節奏地獄。

■特點■
·氣密一觸式控制
·肖像和風景皆為流暢的60 FPS
·九個史詩級別
·刺激的魔王戰
·迷幻視覺效果和原創配樂
·PLAY+模式（增加挑戰難度和速度）
·在iPhone X上以全螢幕顯示
·iCloud 同步

■請注意■
無線耳機會造成顯著的音頻延遲。為了獲得最佳體驗，強烈建議使用有線耳機或音響。

advisories: 偶而/輕微的酒精、菸草或藥物使用或相關內容
tw.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
tw.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

Incredibox 能讓你在一群快樂的節奏口技達人幫助下創作自己的音樂。選擇你的音樂風格，開始錄製、錄音並分享你的混音曲。透過嘻哈節拍、電子波、流行人聲、爵士搖擺、巴西節奏等等聲音，讓你沉醉在音樂的律動之中。此外，還可以探索社群創建的各種模組，其內容素材豐富，能讓你混音上數小時，而且無廣告或應用程式內購。

Incredibox 是遊戲，也是工具，更重要的是一種視聽體驗，所帶來的樂趣很快就成為各年齡層的熱門選擇。音樂、圖形、動畫與互動性的完美結合，讓 Incredibox 適合每個人。由於 Incredibox 讓學習變得有趣且具娛樂性，現在廣為全球各地學校使用。

怎麼玩？很簡單！將圖示拖放到虛擬人物上讓他們唱歌，然後開始創作你的音樂。找對的聲音組合，解鎖動畫合唱，增強你的旋律。

只要你的作品聽起來很棒，就儲存並分享，以盡可能獲得投票。假如你獲得足夠的票數，就能進入 Incredibox 歷史，加入 50 強排行榜！準備好展示你的作品了嗎？

你還可以從應用程式中將你的混音曲下載成 MP3 反覆聆聽！

懶得創作自己的混音曲？沒問題，讓自動模式為你播放吧！

調高音量，輕鬆一下 ;)

****************
Incredibox，來自法國里昂，於 2009 年創立的 So Far So Good 工作室的心血結晶。最初以網頁形式出現，隨後推出了移動及平板應用程式，迅速成為熱門產品。它贏得了多項獎項，並出現在各大國際媒體上，包括：BBC、Adobe、FWA、Gizmodo、Slate、Konbini、Softonic、Kotaku、Cosmopolitan、PocketGamer、AppAdvice、AppSpy、Vice、Ultralinx 等等。線上演示影片自創建以來已吸引超過 1 億訪問者。

MiniGames 是一個包含新、復古和現代遊戲的合集。您可以在您的 Apple Watch、iPhone 或 iPad 上無廣告遊玩！
這就像是您隨身攜帶的個人遊戲機台。

這個合集包含 24 款遊戲：

■ PONG
遊玩其中一個最早創建的電子遊戲。這個簡單的網球類遊戲是一個絕對的經典。

■ BRICK BREAK
一個有趣的復古落磚遊戲。使用數位旋鈕或您的手指來移動磚塊。點擊以旋轉，向下滑動以放置磚塊。將磚塊堆疊在一起以清除一行並獲取一些分數。

■ INVADERS
經典街機動作。射擊所有太空入侵者，在他們抓到你之前。擊中母艦以獲取獎勵分數。

■ 2048
在您的手錶或手機上享受令人上癮的 2048 遊戲。滑動數字瓷磚來合併它們。將瓷磚合併以達到 2048。

■ TUBE TWIST
引導您的跑者穿過無盡的管道。扭轉管道以避開洞穴和尖刺。收集黃色能量球，收集的越多，速度提升的時間越長。點擊您的玩家來啟動加速。加速時撞擊紅色跳躍點可獲取額外分數。

■ BUBBLE
經典的三消益智遊戲。按顏色連接泡泡以清除它們。

■ MISSILE
您能在致命的追蹤導彈攻擊下生存多久？操縱您的戰鬥機以避開導彈並讓它們互相碰撞。

■ HOP
從平台跳到平台以獲得更多的高度和分數。在途中射擊帶翅膀的壞蛋。

■ DRIFT
享受在險惡道路上的高辛烷值漂移。一個錯誤的動作就會墜落。儘可能長時間生存以獲得最高分數。收集星星以獲取額外分數。

■ CONG
這像 Pong，但在一個圓圈裡。使用數位旋鈕來移動圓圈內的拍子，保持球在遊戲中。

■ TOWER
通過堆疊彩色方塊來建造您的塔。完美放置它們以獲取額外分數。

■ FLAP
引導鳥兒穿越無盡的森林，不斷拍動翅膀。

■ FROG ROAD
幫助可愛的青蛙避開汽車並穿過馬路。這是經典 Frogger 遊戲的 3D 升級版。

■ BLOCK RUN
想跑步嗎？幫助體素小人避開五彩繽紛的障礙物，通過跳躍、滾動和轉彎來完成挑戰。

■ MATCHTRIS
Tetris 和 Dr. Mario 的混搭遊戲。移動下落的方塊來連接 4 個或更多相同顏色的方塊以清除它們。設置方塊以實現連鎖反應並獲取額外分數。

■ DRONE
駕駛您的無人機穿過外星飛船的無盡走廊。

■ THRUST
穿上火箭靴並飛越黑暗的洞穴。Thrust 結合了經典洞穴飛行遊戲和 Flappy Bird 的元素。

■ SUPER JUMP
我們將平台遊戲的樂趣與無盡奔跑者遊戲相結合。通過跳過洞穴、壕溝和敵人來保持您的玩家奔跑。收集水果以獲取分數，您得分越多，跑得越快。

■ RETRO RACER
受 Outrun 和 Pole Position 等偽 3D 賽車遊戲啟發，但具有現代圖形。享受超現實、令人興奮的速度感，並競速以擊敗時鐘。

請注意，此遊戲需要第 4 代或更新版本的 Apple Watch。

■ CONTRA PANG
將 Contra 的射擊動作與 Pang 的泡泡消除樂趣相結合的遊戲。

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
經典 Space Invaders 的新變種。具有獨特的圓形設計和大量的能量提升。

■ MOON SNAKE
我們將經典的吃水果蛇遊戲帶到了月球。避開炸彈和自己的尾巴以生存。

■ DUAL BREAK
還有什麼比經典的 Breakout 拍子遊戲更好？怎麼樣再加上能量提升和額外的拍子來控制。

■ CIRCLE BREAK
這就像圓形 Pong 遇上 Breakout。保持球不離開圓圈並打破所有障礙以完成關卡。

功能：
• 無廣告！
• 支援 Apple Watch
• 屏幕震動
• 震動效果
• 音效
• 音樂
• 排行榜

us.trackCensoredName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

us.description:
Prepare for battle - a mob of heroes is about to invade your territory!
Build traps facilities in your dungeon, hire monsters, discover relics with mysterious power, and protect your dungeon from heroes that came to take you down.

◆ CONTENTS
- 9 Dark Lords with special skills!
- 300+ monsters and heroes
- 100+ traps and facilities for your dungeon
- 200+ relics with mysterious power
- Various EVENTS filled with surprises
- Various elements that can be unlocked throughout gameplay
- and more…!
We are planning to add more Dark Lords, traps, monsters, and more game modes!

◆ CREATE YOUR OWN DUNGEON
Think carefully when placing traps, facilities, and monsters into your dungeon. Strong strategy will help you survive the swarm of heroes and allow you to unlock more elements for your dungeon. May your dungeon endure the bravest heroes there are!

◆ EXPLORE YOUR FATE
Choose your fate from a selection of fate cards every day. If you wish to battle, heroes will come, and if you wish for surprises, a special event will take place.
Choose the fate you want as the master of your dungeon.

-SUPPORT-
E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com
Tel :+82 10-4178-0283

Three seconds a bill. Fast, Security and Easy to use is our aim, and iOS notification center widget.

Look at other people how to say:
◎ I just downloaded this app and I am so loving it already! It seems easy to use but I need to explore it more.
◎ Very innovative work. Keep up guys. 5 star app.
◎ It's quick to note down your expenses and helps you track your money.
◎ Polished, smart, simple, with all functions of apps of this kind. Exactly the one I was looking for. Makes me delete other similar apps on my phone and keep only this one, really.
◎ I love this app! It is clean, beautiful, very customizable, and user-friendly. I love the ability to make your own categories and accounts. And I also love the ability to put it in your pull-down Notification Center on your phone. It makes it quickly accessible during the day. Great job, love the app!

Apple Watch:
You can create incomes and expenses from your Apple Watch. The Glance shows your expenses of today, this month.

Feature：
◎ Three seconds only: pull down, fill money, choose category
◎ iOS notification center widget: you can easily account when iPhone lock screen
◎ Passcode security: everyone cannot open, only you. even double-click the Home button, in the App list can not view the data
◎ Support more than 160 kinds of currency, conversion exchange rate automatic updates
◎ Calculator: built-in calculator, more convenient and faster
◎ Full gestures: fast billing basic
◎ Humane beginners guide: for special operations, we guide the way through the animation + text, more intuitive, easier to understand
◎ iCloud backup & restore
◎ Dropbox backup & restore
◎ Export data to CSV via Email
◎ Recurring event, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options.
◎ Allow custom theme color and wallpaper.
◎ Allow add transaction from template.

Basic：
◎ Expense & Income bills can be added photos
◎ Income, Expense, Transfer, the others have
◎ Graphical reports, allowing you to easily view the balance of payments situation year / month / week
◎ Budget management: give yourself a reason to control consumption
◎ A variety of color themes and wallpaper, allows you to fully personalize
◎ Custom categories and consumption expenditure accounts, more in line with your needs
◎ Supports iPhone & iPad
◎ Daily reminder

Increase：
◎ Easy copy history through gestures and automatically positioned in the day consumption date, you only need to modify the money can be. of course, you can use the existing money saved directly
◎ You can also add categories and account when billing editing, click on the banner to change currency

If you give up because of difficulties

Infrequent/Mild Horror/Fear Themes
tr.releaseNotes: Changed default lane control setting to touch controls.
tr.description:
*** Winner of Apple Design Award 2019 ***

Thumper is rhythm violence: classic action, blistering speed, and brutal physicality. You are a space beetle. Brave the void and confront a maniacal giant head.

With this special pocket edition, you can play all nine epic levels with one hand.

Hurtle forward, master new moves, and survive terrifying boss battles. Propelled by a pounding original soundtrack, you'll feel every crushing impact. To reach synesthetic bliss, you must conquer rhythm hell.

■ Features ■
・ Nine epic levels
・ Adrenalizing boss battles
・ Psychedelic visuals and original soundtrack
・ Smooth 60 FPS in portrait and landscape (and up to 120 FPS on supported devices)
・ PLAY + mode (increased challenge and speed)
・ Full screen display on iPhone X
・ iCloud Sync

■ Please Note ■
Wireless headphones can add significant audio latency. For the best experience, wired headphones or integrated speakers are strongly recommended.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
tr.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
tr.description:
You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home.

The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions.

Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world.

How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune.

Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff?

You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again!

Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you!

Pump it up and chill ;)

****************
Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

MiniGames is a collection of new, retro and modern games. You can play on your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad with no Ads!
It's like your own personal games arcade on the go.

This collection of 24 games includes:

■ PONG
Play one of the first video games ever created. This simple tennis like game is an absolute classic. 

■ BRICK BREAK
A fun retro falling brick game. Use the Digital crown or your finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to place the brick. Stack the bricks together to clear a line and score some points.

■ INVADERS
Classic arcade action. Shoot all the space invaders before they get you. Hit the mothership for bonus points.

■ 2048
Enjoy the addictive 2048 game on your watch or phone. Swipe the number tiles around to join them. Join the tiles to reach 2048.

■ TUBE TWIST
Guide your runner down an endless tube. Twist the tube to avoid the holes and spikes. Collect the yellow power orbs, the more you collect the longer you can speed boost. Tap your player to activate your speed boost. Hit the red jumps while boosting to get your bonus score. 

■ BUBBLE
Classic match 3 puzzle game. Connect the bubbles by color to clear them.

■ MISSILE
How long can you survive a deadly onslaught of homing missiles? Maneuver your fighter plane to avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other. 

■ HOP
Jump from platform to platform to gain more height and points. Shoot the winged baddies along the way.

■ Drift
Enjoy high octane drifting down a treacherous road. One false move and down you go. Try and survive as long as you can to get the top score. Collect the stars for bonus points.

■ Cong
It's like pong, but in a circle. Use the digital crown to move the paddle around the circle and keep the ball in play.

■ Tower
Build your Tower by stacking colourful blocks on top of each other. Place them perfectly for bonus points.

■ FLAP
Guide the bird through a never ending forest by flapping your wings.

■ FROG ROAD
Help the cute frogs avoid the cars and cross the road. A 3D update to the classic Frogger game.

■ BLOCK RUN
Feel like going for a a run? Help the voxel guy avoid the colourful obstacles by jumping, rolling and turning around the corners.

■ MATCHTRIS
A mashup of Tetris and Dr. Mario. Move the falling blocks to match 4 or more colors to clear them. Setup the blocks to fall and match for combos and extra points.

■ DRONE
Pilot your drone down the never ending corridors of an Alien spaceship.

■ THRUST
Strap your rocket boots on and zoom down a dark cave. Thrust combines a classic cave flyer game with elements of flappy bird.

■ SUPER JUMP
We’ve taken the fun of the humble platformer game and mashed it with an endless runner. Keep your player running by jumping over holes, ditches and enemies. Collect fruit to score points and the more you score the faster you run. 

■ RETRO RACER
Inspired by pseudo 3d racing games like Outrun and Pole Position but with modern graphics. Enjoy the surreal, exhilarating sense of speed while you race to beat the clock.

Please note this game requires a watch series 4 or newer.

■ CONTRA PANG
A mashup of Contra’s shooting action and the bubble popping fun of Pang.

■ CIRCLE INVADERS
A new twist to the classic Space Invaders. With a unique circular design and lots of power-ups.

■ MOON SNAKE
We took the classic fruit eating snake and put him on the moon. Avoid the bombs and your own tail to survive. 

■ DUAL BREAK
What could be better than the classic paddle game Breakout? How about power-ups and an extra paddle to control.

■ CIRCLE BREAK
It’s like Pong in a Circle meets Breakout. Keep the ball from leaving the circle and break all the obstacles to finish the stage.

Features:
• No ads!
• Apple Watch support
• Screen shake
• Vibrations
• Sound Effects 
• Music
• Leaderboards

tr.trackCensoredName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
tr.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
tr.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Profanity or Crude Humour
Frequent/Intense Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
Frequent/Intense Realistic Violence
tr.description:
Tüm dünyayı kendine inandırabilir misin?

Yeni bir inanç ortaya çıktı ve bunu yaymak için sen seçildin. 
İnsanlığın senden ve sözlerinden nefret etmek için hep bir sebebi olacak, yapman gereken sözlerin, mucizelerin kullanmak ve inancın üzerinde yaptığın geliştirmelerin ile dinini tüm dünyaya inandırmak. Nefretlerini kazanmadan insanlar ile konuşmalı, şehirleri gezmeli ve mucizelerin ile yanlışları düzeltmelisin.

Mısır, Kudüs ya da Roma'dan başlayacağın seyahatinde yüzlerce hikaye ve kişi ile karşılaşacak, inancını tüm dünyaya yaymaya çalışırken yirmi farklı sondan birine ulaşacaksın.

Serüvenin boyunca daha fazla inanana ulaşmak için dinini, mucizeler ve felaketler yapabilmek için kendini geliştirebilirsin. 

Sözlerinin etkileri dünyada kaos yaratırken, sen insanların nefreti, yalanlar, krallar ve iblisler ile uğraşarak tüm insanlığın inandığı bir din yaratmalısın.

Yasal Bilgilendirme;
Bu oyun içerisinde, gerçekte var olan herhangi bir inanç ile ilgili hiç bir olay, kişi, hikaye ve kelime kullanılmamıştır. Oyun içerisinde anlatılan hikaye eski bir dönemde geçtiği için tarihi devlet sınırları üzerinden hayali bir harita oluşturulmuştur. Bu oyun içerisinde yer alan karakterler, olaylar, hikayeler ve kelimelerin tamamı hayal ürünüdür ve gerçeği yansıtmamaktadır.

advisories: Loot Boxes
Infrequent/Mild Profanity or Crude Humour
tr.description:
Overwinter Survival is a card-based survival game in which you are stranded on the glaciers of Greenland.

The cold and loneliness ensnare you after your plane breaks down for an unknown reason, leaving you crashed on Greenland's glaciers and seeking shelter at a nearby cabin. Now you must hunt, craft tools and items, and keep your stove fueled to survive in the cold.

In Overwinter Survival, you must use the cards you're dealt to stay alive. You can only use one card per round. With Lady Luck at the helm, no two journeys will be the same.

Fish in the glaciers, hunt with your spear and craft an axe at your workshop to become a lumberjack. To get out of this frozen hell and see your family once again, you must stay alive and repair your plane. 

Experience a unique journey each time you play with randomly generated card decks and test your survival skills while pushing your luck amidst the frozen glaciers.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
Infrequent/Mild Horror/Fear Themes
tr.releaseNotes:
Başkanım dört gücü dengede tutarak kaç yıl başta kalabilirsin?
Bu güncelleme içerisinde;
*Rastgele karşına çıkacak Başkanlık Seçimleri 
*Yeni karakter ve hikayeler 
*Hata düzeltmeleri 
*İOS 13 optimizasyonları bulunmaktadır.
tr.description:
Kaç yıl başta kalabilirsin?

Halkın vereceğin kararları bekliyor! Generaller, din adamları, müttefikler ve düşmanlar, hepsinin bitmek bilmeyen isteklerini cevaplarken iktidarındaki dengeyi kaybetme! 

Başkanlığının her yılında bambaşka olaylar ile karşılaşırken, seçimlerinin ülke hazinesi, halk, ordu ve otoriten üzerinde sonuçları olacak. İktidarını korumak için kararlarını verirken bu dört gücün dengesini kaybetmemelisin.

Bir başkan olarak, iktidarını kaybetmemek için vurdumduymaz, hoşgörülü, acımasız ya da sevgi dolu kararlar vermen gerekecek, bir sonraki kararının sonuçlarını iyi düşünerek, seçimlerini buna göre yapmalı ve iktidarda kaldığın süreyi uzatmalısın, başkanlığın boyunca ittifaklar, hainler ve hatta gizemli misafirler ile uğraşacak ve pek çok farklı sona ulaşacaksın!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
tr.releaseNotes:
Bu sürüm içerisinde;
*Yeni dövüş sistemi eklendi.
*Başlangıç için özel bir sancak eklendi.
*Hata düzeltmeleri yapıldı.
tr.description:
Kararların tahtta kalma süreni belirleyecek.

Monarşi'de hüküm verebilecek tek kişi sensin! Tahtta olduğun sürede herkesin senden istekleri olacak, her seçim devletinin başka bir gücünü etkileyecek, tahtı kaybetmemek için dengeyi korumalısın! 

Tahtının yanında topraklarını korumak içinde kararlar vermen gerekecek, İstanbul'un Fethi, Termopylae Muharebesi, Niğbolu Muharebesi, Deligrad Savaşı ve Alaşehir Kuşatması gibi tarihten gerçek savaşların taktiklerinin basitleştirilmiş halleri ile bir komutan olarak hükümler vererek fetihler yapacaksın.

Hüküm sürdüğün her ay bambaşka bir sorun ile karşılaşırken, seçimlerinin devlet hazinesi, halk, ordu ve otoriten üzerinde sonuçları olacak. Devletin sorunlarının yanında savaşlarda belirleyeceğin taktikler daha fazla toprak feth edip edemeyeceğini belirleyecek. Din adamlarının, halkının, saray hanedanının istekleri seni yıpratırken, savaşlar, haşhaşiler ve gizemli misafirler ile uğraşman gerekecek.

Hükümdar olarak, iktidarını kaybetmemek için vurdumduymaz, hoşgörülü, acımasız ya da sevgi dolu kararlar vermen gerekecek, seçimlerini saray entrikalarını düşünerek yapmalı ve tahtta kaldığın süreyi uzatmalısın, zira pek çok talibi var.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Profanity or Crude Humour
